Detailed Description

Text extracted from a press clip during the recognition process.

Member Function Documentation

void Text::addCharacter ( const std::string &  character,
const unsigned int &  position 
)

Adds a character to the text at given position.

Parameters:
character A STL string object with a single character to add.
position Position where the character will be inserted.
Postcondition:
The character is inserted at given position.
Exceptions:
NessieException If position is greater than the value returned by Text::size().
NessieException If character contains more than one character.
Todo:
Design a better mechanism to throw an exception whenever the string passed contains more than one character. The solution is not simple, as any character with accent causes std::string::size() method to return 2 instead of 1.

void Text::addCharacter ( const std::string &  character  ) 

Adds a character at the end of the text.

Parameters:
character A STL string object with a single character to add.
Postcondition:
The character is appended at the end of the text.
Exceptions:
NessieException If character contains more than one character.

const std::string & Text::content (  )  const [inline]

Returns the text content.

Returns:
A STL string object with the content of the text.

Text Text::operator+ ( const Text &  text  )  const [inline]

Allows to sum a pair of Text objects by appending its contents.

Parameters:
text The text to be appended to the current Text object.
Returns:
A Text object as a result of appending both contents.

void Text::removeCharacter ( const unsigned int &  position  ) 

Removes a single character from the text.

Parameters:
position Position where the character must be removed.
Postcondition:
The character at given position is removed.
Exceptions:
NessiException If position is greater than the value returned by Text::size().

unsigned int Text::size (  )  const [inline]

Returns the size of the text in characters.

Returns:
Number of characters in the text.
